forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display&section=screenshot&id=536)
**File Name** : Software to install Windows from .iso  
**File Submitter** : [Gear54rus](http://reboot.pro/user/65178-gear54rus/ "")  
**File Submitted** : 21 Oct 2014  
**File Updated** : *23 Apr 2015*   
**File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/files/category/7-boot-tools/ "")  

This software is required to install Windows from .iso on USB disk without unpacking.  

This includes:

* [**vmount**](http://reboot.pro/files/file/477-vmount/ "") program - 32 and 64 bit versions by [erwan.l](http://reboot.pro/user/25905-erwanl/ "") \[1\]
* Sleep 32/64 bit from this thread: http://theoven.org/index.php?topic=52.0%C2%A0%5B2%5D
* **[Last but not least -](http://www.f2ko.de/programs.php?lang=en&pid=b2e "External link")**[YUMI](http://www.pendrivelinux.com/yumi-multiboot-usb-creator/ "External link")** by [pendrivelinux.com](http://www.pendrivelinux.com/ "External link") \[4\]**
* **altmbr.bin** from [SYSLINUX](http://www.syslinux.org/wiki/index.php/Download "External link") package \[5\]
* Scripts made by me with the help of guys from this forum to make it all work together.

[Refer to this thread for more info](http://reboot.pro/topic/19773-multiboot-usb-disk-install-windows-78-from-iso-file-on-hidden-partition/ "").  

[Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/files/file/536-software-to-install-windows-from-iso/ "")
